statements: SELECT * FROM fare_collection;
SELECT fare_amount, rider_id FROM fare_collection WHERE fare_amount > 50;
SELECT rider_id, payment_method FROM fare_collection WHERE collection_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT * FROM fare_collection ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT rider_id, fare_amount FROM fare_collection WHERE fare_amount < 20 ORDER BY fare_amount ASC;
SELECT fare_id, fare_amount FROM fare_collection WHERE rider_id = 100 ORDER BY fare_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM fare_collection WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT rider_id, SUM(fare_amount) AS total_fare FROM fare_collection GROUP BY rider_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_collections FROM fare_collection;
SELECT AVG(fare_amount) AS average_fare FROM fare_collection;
SELECT * FROM fare_collection WHERE fare_amount > 50
SELECT rider_id, fare_amount FROM fare_collection ORDER BY fare_amount DESC
SELECT rider_id, fare_amount FROM fare_collection WHERE collection_date = '2021-10-15'
SELECT rider_id, fare_amount FROM fare_collection WHERE fare_amount BETWEEN 30 AND 50
SELECT rider_id, fare_amount, collection_date FROM fare_collection WHERE rider_id = 100
SELECT * FROM fare_collection WHERE rider_id = 12345;
SELECT rider_id, fare_amount FROM fare_collection WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT AVG(fare_amount) AS average_fare FROM fare_collection;
SELECT rider_id, COUNT(*) AS total_rides FROM ridership_data GROUP BY rider_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT rider_id, transportation_mode, SUM(fare_paid) AS total_fare FROM ridership_data GROUP BY rider_id, transportation_mode ORDER BY total_fare DESC;
SELECT * FROM fare_collection;
SELECT fare_id, fare_amount, payment_method FROM fare_collection WHERE fare_amount > 50;
SELECT rider_id, rider_name, rider_type FROM ridership_data ORDER BY rider_name DESC;
SELECT fare_id, rider_id, revenue FROM financial_analysis WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT * FROM fare_collection JOIN ridership_data ON fare_collection.rider_id = ridership_data.rider_id;
SELECT fare_id, fare_amount, payment_method FROM fare_collection WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY fare_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT rider_name, rider_type, total_trips FROM ridership_data WHERE total_trips > 100 ORDER BY total_trips DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, revenue, expenses, profit FROM financial_analysis WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY profit DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT fare_id, rider_id, revenue, expenses, profit FROM fare_collection JOIN financial_analysis ON fare_collection.fare_id = financial_analysis.fare_id WHERE profit > 500 ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT * FROM fare_collection WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, timestamp, NOW()) < 60;
SELECT fare_amount, rider_id FROM public_transport_fare;
SELECT rider_name, rider_email, rider_phone FROM rider_details;
SELECT ride_id, start_location, end_location FROM ride_data ORDER BY ride_id DESC;
SELECT ride_id, ride_duration FROM ride_data WHERE ride_distance > 10;
SELECT total_revenue, cost_analysis, profit FROM financial_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_fare;
SELECT rider_name, rider_email FROM rider_details WHERE rider_id = 5;
SELECT start_location, end_location, ride_distance FROM ride_data ORDER BY ride_distance DESC;
SELECT rider_name, ride_date, total_revenue FROM rider_details JOIN financial_analysis ON rider_details.rider_id = financial_analysis.ride_id;
SELECT fare_amount, profit, cost_analysis FROM public_transport_fare JOIN financial_analysis ON public_transport_fare.fare_id = financial_analysis.fare_id WHERE profit > 1000;
SELECT * FROM FareCollection ORDER BY payment_date DESC, payment_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT rider_name, rider_age FROM RidershipData WHERE ride_distance > 10 ORDER BY rider_age DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, total_fare_collection FROM FinancialAnalysis WHERE total_fare_collection > 5000 ORDER BY analysis_date;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM TransportRoutes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT fare_collection_month, total_fare_collected, average_fare_per_ride FROM FareStatistics ORDER BY total_fare_collected DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT fare_id, rider_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM FareCollection ORDER BY fare_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RidershipData WHERE rider_age > 30 ORDER BY ride_date ASC LIMIT 4;
SELECT rider_name, ride_distance FROM RidershipData WHERE ride_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY rider_name ASC, ride_distance DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, total_fare_collection FROM FinancialAnalysis WHERE total_ridership > 100 ORDER BY total_ridership DESC, analysis_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM TransportRoutes WHERE start_location = 'City A' OR end_location = 'City B' ORDER BY route_id ASC LIMIT 5;
